overview: Funke wants to play football, which her parents angrily discourage. Her mother feels playing will make her unmarriable, whereas her father wants her to pursue the education he never had. Funke persists in playing, worming her way into acceptance by the local football academy players and their coach. When her parents discover her disobedience, they send her to her uncleâ€™s boarding school. Though she tries to embody the acceptable female role, a devious opportunity to play arises.
tagline: A personal story of struggle and inspiration as Funke tries to convince others to allow her to achieve her dream.
title: Funke!
